### 🚀 About Me
<table> <tr> <td valign="top" width="60%">

📚 Currently diving deep into Data Structures & Algorithms with Java to improve problem-solving skills.<br></br>
🤝 Always open to collaborating on CSE projects that involve innovative tech and creative solutions.<br></br>
💬 Feel free to ask me about MERN Stack, Java, Python, and TypeScript!<br></br>
🌱 I enjoy experimenting with new tech trends, solving coding challenges, and optimizing performance.
